articles.title: Brave face slips? Melania's smile disappears - Daily Mail
articles.description: Melania Trump appeared alongside her husband at a World Series baseball game. The former First Lady appeared happy together with her husband when suddenly the smile drained from her face.
articles.content: Former first lady Melania Trump smiled widely as she made her first public appearance with Donald Trump since April - but one camera caught the moment the former first lady's beaming expression slipp… [+4976 chars]
